channel.description: #### What happened? The text for "Armored" still refers to "Defend" as "Sacrifice" #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? It should say "Defend" #### Steps to reproduce: Be a knight #### Comments: https://imgur.com/iXpfbT5

item.title: Knight role information
item.dc:creator: Zachary_Merlin
item.description:
What happened?

The text for “Armored” still refers to “Defend” as “Sacrifice”

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

It should say “Defend”

Steps to reproduce:

Be a knight

Comments:

https://imgur.com/iXpfbT5

Read full topic
